97741.name: Male minus female life expectation, age 0 (OWID)
97741.description: Difference in life expectation between males and females at birth.
97741.datasetName: Life expectation by sex at ages 0, 15, and 45 - OWID based on Hacker (2010) and the US Social Security Administration (2017)
97741.s_name: OWID based on Hacker (2010) and the US Social Security Administration (2017)

source.name: OWID based on Hacker (2010) and the US Social Security Administration (2017)
source.link: Hacker (2010): https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/pdf/10.1080/01615441003720449?needAccess=true and the US Social Security Administration: https://www.ssa.gov/oact/HistEst/PerLifeTables/2017/PerLifeTables2017.html
source.additionalInfo:
The Hacker (2010) data is used for the period 1780 to 1890. The year 1790 refers to the period 1790-99; see Table 8: New Life Tables for the White Population of the United States, 1780-1900 for the original data consulted for this period. 

The US Social Security Administration data is used from 1900 to today.
